definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Individual investors, on the other hand, are not so surprised at Hou's hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，散户们对侯宁的急流勇退并不感觉奇怪。

sentences.english: Fight the rapids as you kayak and raft down the vast Mekong River.
sentences.chinese: 当你的皮船和木筏冲进湄公河时和急流的艰险战斗。

sentences.english: He swam across a raging river, and then finally he delivered the message.
sentences.chinese: 他泅渡过急流，终于将消息送到目的地。

sentences.english: The shower threw a hard tight stream.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴喷水器喷出一股急流。

sentences.english: The movement direction of the moisture channel center is identical with the low-level southeast jet.
sentences.chinese: 水汽输送通道中心的移向与低空东南急流的移向一致。

sentences.english: in the first stage the jet stream lies well to the north and it takes a general west-east direction.
sentences.chinese: 在第一阶段急流远在其北且一般为由西向东的方向。

sentences.english: A rare dry-season downpour produced the thundering runoff.
sentences.chinese: 一次非常干旱季节的倾盆大雨产生了雷鸣般的急流。

sentences.english: The mesoscale characters of the boundary layer SE wind jet are clearer in the early part of jet formation.
sentences.chinese: 初生时，边界层东南风急流的中尺度特征比较明显。

sentences.english: For the waves of death encompassed me, the torrents of destruction assailed me;
sentences.chinese: 曾有死亡的波浪环绕我，匪类的急流使我惊惧。

sentences.english: But are there any dangerous currents?
sentences.chinese: 但海有危险的急流暗涌吗？

sentences.english: A tree is pulled over by tsunami waves.
sentences.chinese: 海啸的急流把一棵树冲倒了。

sentences.english: The term "whitewater" refers to the appearance of the frothy water found in rapids.
sentences.chinese: “白浪”这个词指的是急流泛起水沫的样子。

sentences.english: Day by day I float my paper boats one by one down the running stream .
sentences.chinese: 我每天把纸船一个个放在急流的溪中。

sentences.english: Police recovered their inflatable boat east of the rapids the next day.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，警察在急流东侧发现他们仍未漏气的皮划艇。

sentences.english: The jet sliding along the ridge on isentropic surface is consistent with the dark zone in WV image.
sentences.chinese: 沿等熵面高脊区的下滑急流与水汽图像暗区相当一致。

sentences.english: I will see the entire waterfall only seconds before I go over it.
sentences.chinese: 我只能在穿过急流的前几秒看到整个瀑布。

definition: turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
cliff/steep slope/fig. arrogant and difficult person
